meanings.def: a long curved fruit with a thick yellow skin and that is soft inside, which grows on trees in hot countries
to become angry, crazy or silly
examples: He lost his job and just went bananas.
The British press has gone bananas, proclaiming the end of civilization as we know it.

idioms.def: to become angry, crazy or silly
examples: He lost his job and just went bananas.
The British press has gone bananas, proclaiming the end of civilization as we know it.
